item.title: Bob Marley - No Woman No Cry - Key of C - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song No Woman No Cry by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F, G.

item.title: Bob Marley - Waiting In Vain - Key of G# - Ukulele Underground
